snippet: GAYDE--Ross M. The officers, brokers and staff at Brown Harris Stevens will miss our beloved colleague of over 15 years. A well- respected and devoted member of the Real Estate Community, Ross will be remembered for his dedication to his family, for his commitment to his community, and for his wonderful sense of humor. Our heartfelt sympathy is extended to his family and friends. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GAYDE--Ross M. The officers, brokers and staff at Brown Harris Stevens will miss our beloved colleague of over 15 years. Our heartfelt sympathy is extended to his family and friends. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GAYDE, ROSS M
